explains: v. 包围，围困；打扰，纠缠

sentences.en: The main part of the army moved to Sevastopol to besiege the town.
sentences.cn: 这支部队的主力前往塞瓦斯托波尔去围攻那个小镇。

sentences.en: When forty winters shall besiege thy brow.
sentences.cn: 当四十个严冬围攻你的眉梢。

sentences.en: Are the trees of the field people, that you should besiege them?
sentences.cn: 田间的树木岂是人，叫你糟蹋吗？
